articles.title: A decade later, Samsung deserves to be the "face of Android" - Android Authority
articles.description: There are plenty of great phone brands, but Samsung's history of hardware and software innovations makes it the unofficial face of Android.
articles.content: In the almost 14 years since the launch of Android, many smartphone brands have come and gone. The unforgiving tides of market share continually rise and fall, yet one name has surfed clean through t… [+6576 chars]
